Class ClientConstructionState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.client.state.ClientConstructionState
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientState, Serializable
public class ClientConstructionState extends Object implements ClientState
Client side representation of a ConstructionState.
